3d data - Brand Design

The Challenge

3D Data hired me to design branding. 3D Data makes sense of spatial data and applies 3D interpretation technology to everyday problems.
3D Data does interesting work. I wanted their branding to reflect that, so I decided to design branding that is unique and unconventional. This meant that I tried to design interesting and provocative icons. In addition, in choosing a color scheme, I decided to go with purple, which I think keeps things more interesting, instead of choosing a safe option such as blue. Here’s a landing page mockup I designed where you can find the branding assets.
